summary: 1997 HURRICANE MOTORHOME WITH A FUEL TANK LEAK. CUSTOMER STATES THAT HE HAS HAD THIS REPAIRED 3 TIMES IN THE PAST. CUSTOMER STATED THAT THE BAFFLE IS WHAT IS LEAKING BECAUSE OF THE SEAL FAILING.  *KB  TR   UPDATED 12/12/2007  *BF  THE DEALER STATED PERFORMED RECALL SPEED DEACTIVATION SWITCH.
